title: Mr. Ogami's Tender Kiss: The Secret Side Of My Strict Boss
alternative_title: Mon manager incompris ; Mr. Ogami's Tender Kiss: The Secret Side of My Strict Boss ; Ookami Kachou no Kiss wa Amai - Reitetsu Joushi no Ura no Kao ; オオカミ課長のキスは甘い ; オオカミ課長のキスは甘い～冷徹上司の裏の顔～
status: Mon manager incompris ; Mr. Ogami's Tender Kiss: The Secret Side of My Strict Boss ; Ookami Kachou no Kiss wa Amai - Reitetsu Joushi no Ura no Kao ; オオカミ課長のキスは甘い ; オオカミ課長のキスは甘い～冷徹上司の裏の顔～
description:
Description :
        Haruka Usami is a 24 year old office worker with an honest and hard-working attitude. Her boss, Tsukasa Ogami, is a serious man with eyes like a wolf. She's beginning to feel fed up with her boss's strictness, when she has to continue working after her ex-boyfriend has left her with a horrible loan to pay off! While working another job as a mascot character, she runs into her boss by chance! "I want to help my staff to work and grow together. There's someone in our office who does so much for us..." She gets to hear her boss's true thoughts!? It turns out her serious boss is a softy who's no good with talking to people. Now that she knows, she can't help but find him adorable. Now Haruka has to figure out how to express these feelings to him! What will happen in this odd office love story??
